Articles.Content:
Hello, I just installed EVO and have two problems:

-Earth has Blurry Clouds

-Uranus has a massive white ring around it

https://imgur.com/a/51LafTA
Looks like this is a support issue, and so the thread has been moved to the support sub. Good luck with your issue.
Try downloading EVO again, clear the existing copy out of KSP then install the new one. Also check you have all the dependencies and haven’t included the EVE default configs as well.
